Lately, I have been on a serious toast kick. I don’t need anything fancy: just a crispy, golden piece of sourdough slathered with butter and topped with flaky sea salt or everything bagel seasoning. But here’s the thing: I still don’t have a good way to store my butter. Usually, I just wrap the stick back up in the paper it comes in and put it back in my fridge. Now, though, I think I’ve finally found the perfect butter dish that’ll change this.

On Amazon, I stumbled across Creative Co-Op’s Country Stoneware Butter Dish, which is going for under $20. Not only is it affordable, but it’s also one of the most adorable kitchen items I’ve seen in a long time (and I’ve seen a lot of kitchen products in this gig). It’s got a sweet vintage feel to it that I love. It actually reminds me of the farmhouse-themed kitchen my parents had when I was little, and I can’t get enough of it.  

What Is the Creative Co-Op Country Stoneware Butter Dish?

If you’ve been on the lookout for an adorable, vintage-inspired butter dish, you’re going to want to add this one to cart ASAP! On the front of the container, there’s a black-and-white, hand-drawn-looking farm scene complete with a cow and a barn and framed by pretty flowers and vines. It’s truly so stunning that I bet your friends and family will immediately want to know where you got it.

On the short side, it says “Spread the Love”— how cute! — with more floral detailing surrounding it. The vines also extend all the way around the lid, which features a knob on top so you can easily access the butter inside. Speaking of that, you can fit as many as two sticks inside the dish thanks to its roomy capacity, measuring 6.75 inches long by 4 inches wide by 4.5 inches tall.

Better yet, when you are in between uses of this stoneware dish, you can toss it right into your dishwasher for easy cleaning. Plus, when the need arises, you can also pop it into your microwave. As someone who bakes, I think that would be so nice when I’m down to the last bit of butter and need to melt it for a cookie or cake recipe.   

What Amazon Shoppers Are Saying

“It is so affordable and looks way more expensive than it actually is. I loved gifting this to a friend for her wedding. Creative Co-Op is always the best quality.” — Hannah

“Adorable, heavy, and holds a pound of butter. Arrived in perfect condition.” — Jayne

“I really wanted a new butter dish, and not just a plastic one … something a bit more elevated. I spent some time looking, and this was my favorite one I saw. I was so pleased with the quality and look of it!” — Gretchen
